entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 12:19 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: ENE 46 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
